name: Topaz & Numby
story: Topaz is the Leader of the Special Debts Picket Team and high-level manager of the Strategic Investment Department under the Interastral Peace Corporation.A member of the "Ten Stonehearts" at a young age, Topaz's foundational expertise is "debt retrieval."Her partner, the Warp Trotter "Numby," is also capable of keenly perceiving where "riches" are located, ensuring that jobs based in security, debt collection, and actuarial varieties are of no great challenge.At presently they are traveling the cosmos together, seeking all manner of liability disputes that might be affecting the stable progression of the IPC's businesses.

skills.name: Deficit...
skills.description: Deals minor Fire DMG to an enemy.

skills.name: Difficulty Paying?
skills.description: Inflicts a single enemy with a Proof of Debt status and causes it to receive increased DMG from follow-up attacks. Numby deals Fire DMG to the target.

skills.name: Turn a Profit!
skills.description: Numby enters the Windfall Bonanza! state and increases its DMG multiplier and CRIT DMG.

skills.name: Trotter Market!?
skills.description: At the start of battle, summons Numby. When Numby takes action, Numby deals follow-up attacks to a single enemy with Proof of Debt. When an enemy with Proof of Debt takes DMG from follow-up attacks, Numby's action is Advanced Forward.

skills.name: Explicit Subsidy
skills.description: Summons Numby to tag along in a Maze. Numby will automatically search for Basic Treasures and Trotters nearby. Using Technique will regenerate Energy for Topaz after Numby's first attack in the next battle.

eidolons.name: Future Market
eidolons.description: When enemies afflicted with Proof of Debt receive follow-up attacks, they will enter the Debtor state. This can take effect only once within a single attack.The Debtor state increases the CRIT DMG of follow-up attacks inflicted on the target enemies by 25%, stacking up to 2 time(s). When Proof of Debt is removed, the Debtor state is also removed.

eidolons.name: Bona Fide Acquisition
eidolons.description: After Numby takes action and launches an attack, Topaz regenerates 5 Energy.

eidolons.name: Seize the Big and Free the Small
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Agile Operation
eidolons.description: After Numby's turn begins, Topaz's action is Advanced Forward by 20%.

eidolons.name: Inflationary Demand
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Incentive Mechanism
eidolons.description: Numby's attack count during the Windfall Bonanza! state increases by 1, and its Fire RES PEN increases by 10% when it attacks.
